Package semsim.annotation

Class ReferenceOntologyAnnotation

java.lang.Object
semsim.annotation.Annotation
semsim.annotation.ReferenceOntologyAnnotation
public class ReferenceOntologyAnnotation
extends Annotation
A type of Annotation where the annotation value is a URI from a reference ontology or other controlled knowledge base.

    • ReferenceOntologyAnnotation

      public ReferenceOntologyAnnotation​(Relation relation, java.net.URI uri, java.lang.String valueDescription, SemSimLibrary lib)
      Constructor for annotation
      Parameters:
      relation - The relationship between the object being annotated and the knowledge base URI
      uri - The URI annotation value
      valueDescription - A free-text description of the resource corresponding to the URI
      lib - A SemSimLibrary instance

  • Method Details

    • getBioPortalOntologyNamespace

      public java.lang.String getBioPortalOntologyNamespace()
      Returns:
      The BioPortal Ontology namespace of the knowledge base that contains the URI annotation value

    • getValueDescription

      public java.lang.String getValueDescription()
      Overrides:
      getValueDescription in class Annotation
      Returns:
      The free-text description of the resource corresponding to the URI

    • getReferenceOntologyName

      public java.lang.String getReferenceOntologyName()
      Returns:
      The name of the knowledge base that contains the URI used as the annotation value

    • getNamewithOntologyAbreviation

      public java.lang.String getNamewithOntologyAbreviation()
      Returns:
      The name of the knowledge base that contains the URI used as the annotation value

    • getOntologyAbbreviation

      public java.lang.String getOntologyAbbreviation()
      Returns:
      The abbreviation of the knowledge base containing the URI used for the annotation value

    • setReferenceURI

      public void setReferenceURI​(java.net.URI uri)
      Set the URI annotation value
      Parameters:
      uri - The URI to reference

    • getReferenceURI

      public java.net.URI getReferenceURI()
      Returns:
      The URI used as the annotation value

    • getAltNumericalID

      public java.lang.String getAltNumericalID()
      Returns:
      A numerical ID for the reference concept (only used to map Foundational Model of Anatomy URIs to their numerical FMA IDs.

    • setAltNumericalID

      public void setAltNumericalID​(java.lang.String ID)
      Parameters:
      ID - The numerical ID of the reference term (only used for the Foundational Model of Anatomy)
